alert.note: Alert for Fayette Ridges; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 2:38PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND AND NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 237 PM EST, snow showers were located near New Stanton, or 7 miles southwest of Jeannette, moving southeast at 30 mph. Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Youngwood, West Newton, New Stanton, Calumet-Norvelt, Madison, Arona, Hunker, Donegal, Champion, Herminie, Acme, and Jones Mills. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 51 and 57. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 70 and 99. Rapid onset of quick accumulations and recuded visibilities in snow remain possible. Motorists should exercise caution if traveling through the area.
